p: Non-pharmaceutical measures such as social distancing, school closure and teleworking (Di Domenico et al. Expected impact of school closure and telework to mitigate COVID-19 epidemic in France. Report #8, 14 March 2020 Epicx-lab.com, https://www.epicx-lab.com/uploads/9/6/9/4/9694133/inserm_covid-19-school-closure-french-regions_20200313.pdf) are expected to delay and reduce the peak incidence and to achieve a reduction of the final attack rate of 15% (Additional Epicx-lab Reports www.epicx-lab.com/covid-19.html). Reasonable interventions that can lead to a significant reduction in the impact of the epidemic profile and should be considered and evaluated without any delay.
